snippet: Gawker employees were the first in a series of digital media workers to seek a union contract.
abstract: Gawker Media and its union Writers Guild of America reach agreement on labor contract; agreement, which sets minimum annual salary of $50,000, is first for digital media company.
lead_paragraph: Gawker employees were the first in a series of digital media workers to seek a union contract.

headline.main: Gawker and Union Reach Agreement on Contract
headline.print_headline: Gawker Staff, Now Union, Negotiates First Contract
